title: Speed distrubtion curve when two samples mix

content.question: Two samples of the same type of gas molecules are placed in different closed containers and are thermally isolated from each other and the environment. The figure above shows the distribution of speeds for the molecules in each of the samples. The two samples are now mixed together and allowed to reach thermal equilibrium. Which of the following is true of the peak of the distribution for the mixed sample?

choices.label: It is closer to 400 m/s than it is to 800 m/s
It is closer to 800 m/s than it is to 400 m/s .
It is midway between the peaks of the distributions shown.
There is not just one peak but two, at the same locations as the peaks of the distributions shown.

content.answer: It is closer to 400 m/s than it is to 800 m/s
